Params: {3: '...It is not typical for you to say something like this, yet, for some reason, you cannot help but say it.'}
{3: 'As if your soul has also been freed from that interrogation room, and you are standing with Cerberus here and now.'}
{3: 'You can feel the exhilaration in your heart as it beats and your blood boils.'}
{2: 'This is the true measure of a Chief!', 3: '8'}
{3: 'Vera pauses for one second before coming to a decision.'}
{3: 'Voodoo is no match for Cerberus. His defeat is inevitable.'}
{3: 'No. 21 and Noctis are suddenly knocked back by an immense force one after another. Everyone loses their balance and drops their weapons, falling to the ground.'}
{3: 'Even Vera is trapped by the whip.'}
{3: 'The man who fell to the side, defeated by Voodoo, stands up nonchalantly with a grin.'}
{3: 'Elegantly Roland steps up and takes off an invisible hat, bowing under the moon like a magician giving his curtain call.'}

{2: 'Roland', 3: "What an opening act! You've saved me a lot of work, let me tell you that. As for the audience who tried to sneak in without a ticket... I think a little punishment is in order, no?", 4: '1'}

{3: "Roland does not bother to restrain Voodoo, who is no match for him now that Cerberus has worn him down. So he strolls to Voodoo and stands there, towering over him, and Voodoo's large frame looks unraveled in his shadow."}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Now, can I have your ticket, please, ma'am?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Voodoo raises her head and reveals the face behind her mechanical mask.'}
{2: 'Voodoo', 3: '...Mr. Vonnegut will be very satisfied with your performance.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Roland takes out his gun and points it at Voodoo's shattered mask. They lower their voices."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Hey! What are you about?! Speak up!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Where the hell did this Voodoo come from? And what the hell is this? You Mary Poppin' now, Roland? Enough with your magic tricks! Let me go, and we'll do it one-on-one—", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "It's verbal assault, kid. I'm trying to get into his head with my words...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As Noctis is still struggling, Voodoo glances at you. She licks her metal arm before spreading her wings, and the jet engine underneath it launches her into the air...'}
{3: 'Until she disappears at the top of the cliff.'}
{3: 'Roland laughs. He holsters his gun and looks at you, seemingly knowing that you are connected to No. 21 at the moment. He stares at her, and she tenses up, growling.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Interesting... Commandant, I'd love to see your face when you find out the truth...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You hear the sound of helicopter rotors. The reinforcement is here.'}
{3: 'Roland turns around and leaves the valley.'}
{3: 'Vera cannot help herself but giggle. Even when her mobility is disabled, she still laughs like there is no tomorrow without a hint of having been just defeated.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Don't tell me Vera has lost it... Has it been too much for her?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'This is... oh my god... the true measure... hahahaha, of a Chief...', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I've been holding it in—how the hell did you say that stupid line with a straight face?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "...Heh, hahahahaha! I didn't even realize it!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera finally stops laughing, her mood seemingly unaffected by the outcome of the mission.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'That said, not too bad for a comeback, Chief. Even for me.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "You're making me more and more excited...", 4: '3'}
{3: "Roland's traps seem to have lost power by now. Vera is the first to break her invisible shackle."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Hmph, it's just a magnetic restraint device. He probably dropped it when we were dealing with Voodoo.", 4: '3'}
{2: "It's not the same thing he did in Venus Splash Park?", 3: '115'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Stay there like that, you loser. We wouldn't have gotten into this mess if you did your job correctly.", 4: '3'}
{3: "The night breeze carries with it a constant buzz. Is that the sound of your blood...? No—it's an engine."}

{3: 'Vera stands up straight and picks up her weapon. The wind stirs up her hair, and tiny raindrops linger on it. In the distance, a row of transport crafts slowly flies above the estate toward you.'}
